title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5001.16 - Conversion to vending machines or manual sales
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5001.16 - Conversion to vending machines or manual sales

State Regulations

Upon mutual agreement between an agent and the
commission, any licensed location may be converted from a manual-type operation
to a vending machine-type operation, and from a vending machine-type operation
to a manual-type operation, for the sale of lottery tickets. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5001.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
